caption.p: ( a) Schematic diagram of the bidirectional freeze-drying process to prepare the cellulose-graphene composite aerogel, ( b) SEM image of the cellulose-graphene aerogel (the insert is the photograph of aerogel on the dandelion), ( c) elastic cycle performance of aerogels by 100 cycles [ 64]; reproduced with permission from Elsevier. ( d) Photograph of the cellular aerogel on the feather, ( e) SEM image of the cellular aerogels, ( f) illustration of continuous oil-in-water emulsion separation by cellular aerogel [ 196]; reproduced with permission from Nature.
